snippet: Britain’s central bank kept its main interest rate unchanged at 0.5 percent on Thursday, and also opted to keep its bond-purchasing program unchanged.
abstract: Bank of England will keep its bond purchasing program unchanged, holding the stimulus program at 325 billion pounds, or $523 billion; also keeps its main interest rate unchanged at 0.5 percent.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s central bank kept its main interest rate unchanged at 0.5 percent on Thursday, and also opted to keep its bond-purchasing program unchanged.

headline.main: Central Bank In Britain Stays Course On 2 Fronts
headline.print_headline: Central Bank In Britain Stays Course On 2 Fronts
